The properties implemented are:

  • Mw: Molecular weight
  • HP: Hidrophobicity by the Kyte-Doolitle Scale
  • IP: Isoelectric Point
  • ECI: Electronic Charge Index
  • ISA: Isotropic Surface Area
  • Vm: Volumen
  • Z1: Combined measure of hidrophobicity related properties
  • Z2: Combined measure of bulkiness related properties
  • Z3: Combined measure of electron related properties
  • Pa: Probability of being in alpha helix
  • Pb: Probability of being in beta sheet
  • Pt: Probability of being in beta turn

References

Hellberg, S.; Sjostrom, M.; Skagerberg, B.; Wold, S. Peptide Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship, a Multivariate Approach. J. Med. Chem. 1987, 30, 1126-1135.

Kyte, J.; Doolitle, R. F. A Simple Method for Displaying the Hydropathic Character of a Protein. J. Mol. Biol. 1982, 157, 105-132.

Hellberg, S.; Sjostrom, M.; Skagerberg, B.; Wold, S. Peptide Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship, a Multivariate Approach. J. Med. Chem. 1987, 30, 1126-1135.
